fields.name: objectId
fields.doc: ZTF object identifier

fields.name: decmean
fields.doc: Mean Dec in degrees

fields.name: decstd
fields.doc: Standard deviation of Dec in arcseconds

fields.name: ramean
fields.doc: Mean RA in degrees

fields.name: rastd
fields.doc: Standard deviation of RA in arcseconds

fields.name: glatmean
fields.doc: Mean galactic latitude in degrees

fields.name: glonmean
fields.doc: Mean galactic longitude in degrees

fields.name: jdgmax
fields.doc: Latest Julian Day of g mag candidates

fields.name: gmag
fields.doc: Latest g magnitude

fields.name: dmdt_g
fields.doc: most recent increase in g magnitude divided by time difference, (brightening = positive)

fields.name: dmdt_g_2
fields.doc: 2nd most recent increase in g magnitude divided by time difference

fields.name: mag_g02
fields.doc: Latest Exponential Moving Average of difference magnitude in g band, with 2-day timescale (see note)

fields.name: mag_g08
fields.doc: Latest Exponential Moving Average of difference magnitude in g band, with 8-day timescale (see note)

fields.name: mag_g28
fields.doc: Latest Exponential Moving Average of difference magnitude in g band, with 28-day timescale (see note)

fields.name: maggmax
fields.doc: Maximum g magnitude of light curve (faintest)

fields.name: maggmean
fields.doc: Mean g magnitude of light curve

fields.name: maggmin
fields.doc: Minimum g magnitude of light curve (brightest)

fields.name: jdrmax
fields.doc: Latest Julian Day of r mag candidates

fields.name: mag_r02
fields.doc: Latest Exponential Moving Average of difference magnitude in r band, with 2-day timescale (see note)

fields.name: mag_r08
fields.doc: Latest Exponential Moving Average of difference magnitude in r band, with 8-day timescale (see note)

fields.name: mag_r28
fields.doc: Latest Exponential Moving Average of difference magnitude in r band, with 28-day timescale (see note)

fields.name: rmag
fields.doc: latest r magnitude

fields.name: dmdt_r
fields.doc: most recent increase in r magnitude divided by time difference, (brightening = positive)

fields.name: dmdt_r_2
fields.doc: 2nd most recent increase in r magnitude divided by time difference

fields.name: magrmax
fields.doc: Maximum r magnitude of light curve (faintest)

fields.name: magrmean
fields.doc: Mean r magnitude of light curve

fields.name: magrmin
fields.doc: Minimum r magnitude of light curve (brightest)

fields.name: jdmax
fields.doc: Maximum of jdgmax and jdrmax

fields.name: jdmin
fields.doc: Earliest Julian Day of candidates that cite this object

fields.name: ncand
fields.doc: Number in light curve

fields.name: ncandgp
fields.doc: Number in light curve with good quality and brighter than reference

fields.name: distpsnr1
fields.doc: Distance of closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [arcsec]

fields.name: sgscore1
fields.doc: Star/Galaxy score of closest source from PS1 catalog 0 <= sgscore <= 1 where closer to 1 implies higher likelihood of being a star

fields.name: sgmag1
fields.doc: g-band PSF magnitude of closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec

fields.name: srmag1
fields.doc: r-band PSF magnitude of closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec

fields.name: htm16
fields.doc: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh level 16

fields.name: g_minus_r
fields.doc: Value of g-r on most recent night when both were available and both positive difference magnitudes

fields.name: jd_g_minus_r
fields.doc: Julian date of most recent g measure on a night when both ag and r were available and both positive difference magnitudes

fields.name: ncandgp_7
fields.doc: Number in light curve with good quality and brighter than reference in last 7 days

fields.name: ncandgp_14
fields.doc: Number in light curve with good quality and brighter than reference in last 14 days

fields.name: ssnamenr
fields.doc: MPC name of Solar System object
